channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: At the Florida Senior Games, pickleball is the crown jewel. Here's why
item.description: Pickleball is the fastest-growing sport and it's also popular with older athletes. All Things Considered went to the Florida Senior Games to find out why.
item.content:encoded:
Pickleball is the fastest-growing sport and it's also popular with older athletes. All Things Considered went to the Florida Senior Games to find out why.

(Image credit: Zack Wittman for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Juana Summers

item.title: How the holidays could be affecting your medical care
item.description: A new study suggests that holidays can affect your provider's decision making.
item.content:encoded:
A new study suggests that holidays can affect your provider's decision making.

(Image credit: Tatyana)
item.dc:creator: Greg Rosalsky

item.title: Here's what we know about the deadly school shooting in Madison, Wisconsin
item.description: The suspect is likely to have died from a gunshot wound, but the cause of death has yet to be confirmed by a medical examiner.
item.content:encoded:
The suspect is likely to have died from a gunshot wound, but the cause of death has yet to be confirmed by a medical examiner.

(Image credit: Scott Olson)
item.dc:creator: Ayana Archie

item.title: Apprenticeships are a trending alternative to college â€” but there's a hitch
item.description: Apprenticeships are becoming a popular alternative to college as a career path. But demand is outpacing the supply of employers who offer them.
item.content:encoded:
Apprenticeships are becoming a popular alternative to college as a career path. But demand is outpacing the supply of employers who offer them.

(Image credit: Megan Jelinger)
item.dc:creator: Jon Marcus

item.title: FBI warns Americans to keep their text messages secure: What to know
item.description: The U.S. believes hackers affiliated with China's government are infiltrating telecoms and stealing users' data. The FBI has urged people to use end-to-end encryption to keep their info safe.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. believes hackers affiliated with China's government are infiltrating telecoms and stealing users' data. The FBI has urged people to use end-to-end encryption to keep their info safe.

(Image credit: Damien Meyer)
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: 'Love Is Blind' cast are employees, labor board says. Could a reality TV union be next?
item.description: The case could have big implications for what glues reality show fans to the tube. A pending ruling, whatever the outcome, would set a precedent that other unscripted TV cast members could follow.
item.content:encoded:
The case could have big implications for what glues reality show fans to the tube. A pending ruling, whatever the outcome, would set a precedent that other unscripted TV cast members could follow.

(Image credit: Netflix)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: A transplanted pig kidney offers a grandmother hope for life without dialysis
item.description: The patient was in kidney failure and her immune system would reject a human organ. Scientists hope genetically modified pig organs prove safe and will alleviate the organ shortage and save lives.
item.content:encoded:
The patient was in kidney failure and her immune system would reject a human organ. Scientists hope genetically modified pig organs prove safe and will alleviate the organ shortage and save lives.

(Image credit: Joe Carrotta for NYU Langone Health)
item.dc:creator: Rob Stein

item.title: 'Fake electors' from 2020 are casting 2024 votes for Trump while facing felony charges
item.description: Eight of the Republicans set to cast Michigan and Nevada's 2024 Electoral College votes for President-elect Donald Trump still face felony charges related to efforts to reverse Trump's 2020 loss.
item.content:encoded:
Eight of the Republicans set to cast Michigan and Nevada's 2024 Electoral College votes for President-elect Donald Trump still face felony charges related to efforts to reverse Trump's 2020 loss.

(Image credit: Andrew Caballero-Reynolds)
item.dc:creator: Hansi Lo Wang

item.title: Magnitude 7.3 earthquake causes widespread damage in Pacific island nation of Vanuatu
item.description: The earthquake was centered 10 miles west of Port Vila, the largest city in Vanuatu, a group of 80 islands that is home to about 330,000 people.
item.content:encoded:
The earthquake was centered 10 miles west of Port Vila, the largest city in Vanuatu, a group of 80 islands that is home to about 330,000 people.

(Image credit: Dan McGarry)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: An explosion kills the head of Russia's nuclear defense forces in Moscow
item.description: A senior Russian general was killed Tuesday by a bomb hidden in a scooter outside his apartment building in Moscow. A Ukrainian official said the country's security service carried out the attack.
item.content:encoded:
A senior Russian general was killed Tuesday by a bomb hidden in a scooter outside his apartment building in Moscow. A Ukrainian official said the country's security service carried out the attack.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
